column5: Let me introduce you all to Casey.     Took him a couple of days to settle in, but he's ruling the roost now. Quite the little rascal at 14 weeks. Loves chewing on my feet.
Very cool Bruce! and knowing you he will be well taken care of!
A little Mini-Peanut.  Very good to see Bruce!  When are you going to start him on the Perch diet??
More my wife's style than my but best to you & your new fishing buddy, 2 lines now lol Tight Lines SBK
Sweet little pup you got there Bruce.  He'll never replace your last little buddy but you'll probably become as close  as you were with with the new one.
Very sweet pup Bruce, I know that he will have a wonderful home...
Note to self.Do not open this thread while the mrs,s is around.LOL  Nice addition Bruce.
Beutiful Bruce !!! May you have many days fishing together, and many new memories to share with all of us   Paul
